objects.specification: A flat indoor floor surface spanning the entire classroom, with a slim profile of neutral tone, designed to provide a durable and even foundation for furniture and movement. The style is minimalistic with a lightly textured finish to prevent slipping, featuring a subtle matte surface that complements the overall earthy tone of the room.

A full-height structural interior wall with a smooth surface, painted in an earthy olive-green color on the inside. The wall has a uniform thickness and minimal architectural detailing to serve as a sturdy backdrop for mounted fixtures and decorations. Suitable for mounting educational charts and posters.

A full-height structural interior wall with a smooth surface, painted in an earthy olive-green color on the inside. The wall has a uniform thickness and minimal architectural detailing to serve as a sturdy backdrop for mounted fixtures and decorations. Suitable for mounting educational charts and posters.

A full-height structural interior wall with a smooth surface, painted in an earthy olive-green color on the inside. The wall has a uniform thickness and minimal architectural detailing to serve as a sturdy backdrop for mounted fixtures and decorations. Suitable for mounting educational charts and posters.

A full-height structural interior wall with a smooth surface, painted in an earthy olive-green color on the inside. The wall has a uniform thickness and minimal architectural detailing to serve as a sturdy backdrop for mounted fixtures and decorations. Suitable for mounting educational charts and posters.

A large teacher's desk crafted from darker wood with a polished finish, rectangular shape with gently rounded edges. It has a spacious top surface and sturdy legs, exuding a professional and classic style that distinguishes it from the students' furniture. The desk includes subtle bevels and a smooth wood grain texture.

A small educational dinosaur-themed model or toy with vibrant colors and realistic detailing. The object has smooth contours and a polished surface that evokes a playful yet scientific style. The toy is designed to be visually engaging and scientifically accurate, with fine textural details.

A small educational dinosaur-themed model or toy with vibrant colors and realistic detailing. The object has smooth contours and a polished surface that evokes a playful yet scientific style. The toy is designed to be visually engaging and scientifically accurate, with fine textural details.

A simple cylindrical waste bin made of durable material with a matte finish in neutral gray. It features a smooth outer surface and a slightly flared top edge. The style is practical and unobtrusive, suited for classroom use.

A large rectangular whiteboard with a glossy white surface and slender aluminum frame. The board has a clean and modern look, with minimal hardware and a uniform mounting. Designed for clear writing visibility and easy erasing, the board showcases an unblemished and highly reflective finish.

A rectangular student desk made of light wood material with a simple and functional design. It features a tabletop supported by slender, straight legs and has a slight bevel around the edges. The style is clean and modern, with a smooth lightly varnished finish that highlights the natural wood grain.

A student chair with a sturdy yet lightweight frame, featuring a contoured backrest and seat. The chair is made of complementary materials in warm earthy tones, with slightly tapered legs and a gently curved seat. The design is ergonomically inspired for comfort, with a matte finish and subtle wood grain detail.

A rectangular chart depicting dinosaur illustrations in vivid colors, mounted within a thin frame. The poster has a semi-gloss finish and showcases detailed scientific drawings and labels. The style is educational and visually striking, designed to enhance learning and decoration.

A rectangular chart depicting dinosaur illustrations in vivid colors, mounted within a thin frame. The poster has a semi-gloss finish and showcases detailed scientific drawings and labels. The style is educational and visually striking, designed to enhance learning and decoration.

A rectangular chart depicting dinosaur illustrations in vivid colors, mounted within a thin frame. The poster has a semi-gloss finish and showcases detailed scientific drawings and labels. The style is educational and visually striking, designed to enhance learning and decoration.

A circular analog wall clock with a clean white face, black numerals, and slender hands. The clock has a thin frame with a smooth matte finish. The style is classic and functional, providing clear visibility and a minimalistic design.

A life-size dinosaur skeleton model with highly detailed bone structures, rendered in a realistic pale ivory color. The skeleton features articulated joints and a naturalistic posture. The style is scientific museum quality, with a lightly weathered texture and subtle shading.

A tall bookshelf with multiple shelves crafted from light wood, featuring an open-back design and clean lines. Each shelf contains rows of dinosaur-themed books. The style is modern with a soft matte finish revealing the wood grain, combining functionality with thematic decoration.

A large rectangular window with a thin frame, flanked by decorative curtains in earthy green fabric. The curtains have gentle folds and a soft texture. The window glass is clear, providing natural light, and the style is homey and functional with a subtle fabric pattern on the curtains.

A realistic potted plant with broad green leaves and detailed stem textures, set in a simple pot. The pot has a smooth matte finish in neutral tone. The style is organic and naturalistic, adding a touch of greenery and warmth to the environment.

A modern ceiling light fixture with a square profile and frosted diffuser panel. The fixture has a low-profile design and a smooth finish in a soft off-white color. The style is contemporary and utilitarian, providing even and diffuse illumination across the room.
